languages.text: "Если ты хочешь жертву, искусник плоти, я готова ей быть". {n}Голос Ирлиэт вибрирует, но она старается не отводить от Тервантьяса взгляд.{/n} "Возьмешь ли ты мою плоть?"
"If it is a sacrifice you want, artisan of flesh, then I am ready to offer myself as one." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates, but she keeps her eyes locked on Tervantias.{/n} "Will you take my flesh?"
languages.original_text: "Если ты хочешь жертву, искусник плоти, я готова ей быть". {n}Голос Ирлиэт вибрирует, но она старается не отводить от Тервантьяса взгляд.{/n} "Возьмешь ли ты мою плоть?"

traits.locale_text: "If it is a sacrifice you want, artisan of flesh, then I am ready to offer myself as one." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates, but she keeps her eyes locked on Tervantias.{/n} "Will you take my flesh?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If it is a sacrifice you want, artisan of flesh, then I am ready to offer myself as one." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates, but she keeps her eyes locked on Tervantias.{/n} "Will you take my flesh?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「肉体の職工よ、生贄がお望みなら、私は己を捧げる用意がある」{n}ユリエットの声は震えているが、その視線はテルヴァンティアスをしっかりと捉えている。{/n}「私の肉体が欲しいのか？」
languages.original_text: "If it is a sacrifice you want, artisan of flesh, then I am ready to offer myself as one." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates, but she keeps her eyes locked on Tervantias.{/n} "Will you take my flesh?"

traits.locale_text: 「肉体の職工よ、生贄がお望みなら、私は己を捧げる用意がある」{n}ユリエットの声は震えているが、その視線はテルヴァンティアスをしっかりと捉えている。{/n}「私の肉体が欲しいのか？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “如果你渴望祭品的话，血肉大师，那我愿意献上我自己。”{n}伊莉耶特的声音颤抖着，但目光始终直视着特万提亚斯。{/n}“你想得到我的肉吗？”
languages.original_text: "If it is a sacrifice you want, artisan of flesh, then I am ready to offer myself as one." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates, but she keeps her eyes locked on Tervantias.{/n} "Will you take my flesh?"

traits.locale_text: “如果你渴望祭品的话，血肉大师，那我愿意献上我自己。”{n}伊莉耶特的声音颤抖着，但目光始终直视着特万提亚斯。{/n}“你想得到我的肉吗？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Si c'est un sacrifice que vous attendez, artisan de la chair, je m'offrirai à vous. » {n}La voix d'Yrliet tremble, mais elle ne quitte pas Tervantias des yeux.{/n} « Prendrez-vous ma chair ? »
languages.original_text: "If it is a sacrifice you want, artisan of flesh, then I am ready to offer myself as one." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates, but she keeps her eyes locked on Tervantias.{/n} "Will you take my flesh?"

traits.locale_text: « Si c'est un sacrifice que vous attendez, artisan de la chair, je m'offrirai à vous. » {n}La voix d'Yrliet tremble, mais elle ne quitte pas Tervantias des yeux.{/n} « Prendrez-vous ma chair ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Si lo que buscas es un sacrificio, artesano de la carne, estoy dispuesta a ofrecerme como tal». {n}La voz de Yrliet vibra, pero no aparta la mirada de Tervantias.{/n} «¿Aceptarás mi carne?».
languages.original_text: "If it is a sacrifice you want, artisan of flesh, then I am ready to offer myself as one." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates, but she keeps her eyes locked on Tervantias.{/n} "Will you take my flesh?"

traits.locale_text: «Si lo que buscas es un sacrificio, artesano de la carne, estoy dispuesta a ofrecerme como tal». {n}La voz de Yrliet vibra, pero no aparta la mirada de Tervantias.{/n} «¿Aceptarás mi carne?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr ein Opfer wollt, Künstler des Fleisches, bin ich bereit, mich selbst anzubieten." {n}Yrliets Stimme zittert, aber sie lässt Tervantias nicht aus den Augen.{/n} "Werdet Ihr mein Fleisch nehmen?"
languages.original_text: "If it is a sacrifice you want, artisan of flesh, then I am ready to offer myself as one." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates, but she keeps her eyes locked on Tervantias.{/n} "Will you take my flesh?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr ein Opfer wollt, Künstler des Fleisches, bin ich bereit, mich selbst anzubieten." {n}Yrliets Stimme zittert, aber sie lässt Tervantias nicht aus den Augen.{/n} "Werdet Ihr mein Fleisch nehmen?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Et sanatçısı, eğer istediğin şey kurbanlıksa kendimi sunmaya hazırım." {n}Sesi titreyen Yrliet, gözlerini Tevantias'tan kaçırmıyor.{/n} "Benim etimi almak ister misin?"
languages.original_text: "If it is a sacrifice you want, artisan of flesh, then I am ready to offer myself as one." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates, but she keeps her eyes locked on Tervantias.{/n} "Will you take my flesh?"

traits.locale_text: "Et sanatçısı, eğer istediğin şey bir kurbanlıksa, kendimi sunmaya hazırım." {n}Yrliet'in sesi titriyor ancak gözlerini Tevantias'tan kaçırmıyor.{/n} "Benim etimi almak ister misin?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
